speaker: Customer
text: Yes, this is John. Who's calling?

speaker: Agent
text: Hi John, this is Lisa from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: I'm doing okay, thanks. What is this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I'm calling regarding your outstanding balance with ABC Credit Union. Can I get your address to locate your account?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you, John. Your current balance is $550. How do you intend to settle this?

speaker: Customer
text: I really can't pay that amount right now.

speaker: Agent
text: I understand. We can discuss payment plans or possible arrangements. Would that be helpful?

speaker: Agent
text: Great! I can set you up with a payment plan. Just to confirm, your account shows an email on file as john.smith@email.com, is that correct?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you, let’s proceed with discussing your options then!

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for your cooperation, John. I appreciate it.
